data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Xiaoyan, Yang, Ding (2014): Five new species of Centorisoma Becker from China, with an updated key to world species (Diptera, Chloropidae). Zootaxa 3821 (1): 101-115, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3821.1.7
